price: Зато, нека они саставе говор сличан Кур'ану, ако говоре истину.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
